_sText:
a ze map set place in a rollermine factory^^

features:

cubemaps (even though you cant see them that much but you still can a bit) 

lots of different kind of rooms like: labs, storage room, waste room etc

teleporters with sound effects

twisted surprise at the end ^^

and WTF BOOM sound when map is being nuked :D

changes in v2:

adde a another way in the box room

map now supports 64 players

doors now have 30 seconds delay on them so you now have to hold off the zombies

changed a texture which seemed to not be working as it kept changing from black to texture

changes in v3:

fixed the buttons to look better


Changes in v4


added 4 more ways to get up on the boxes in the box room

rounded some corners in the parking lot area. (see screenshot)

made the map change mp_roundtime to 7

added a couple of decals here and there


changes in v5


made that when you fall down in the first room you will teleport back to the start so that the first zombie doesnt keep dying the first minute

varied the console commands and also added commands when the doors opens

made the glass in the room with the 3 doors with 30 seconds delay stronger so it will be easier to defend


changes in 2010

improved the graphics

optimised it abit

modified some holding points for better balance
